body:
$!If you are a British national and were born on or before 2 September 1929, you can get (or renew) a passport for free.$!

You will still have to pay a fee if you need to [get a passport quickly](/passport-quick "get a passport quickly"):

- the 1-week Fast Track service costs £35.00
- the 1-day Premium service costs £52.00

If you use the standard service by post, you can use the [Post Office Check and Send service](/how-the-post-office-check-and-send-service-works "About the Post Office Check and Send service") free of charge.

##If you recently paid for a passport

You can apply for a refund of the [standard passport fee](/passport-fees "standard passport fee") if both conditions apply:

- you've applied for a passport since 19 May 2004 
- you're eligible for a free passport

Contact the Passport Adviceline:

$C
**Passport Adviceline**    
**Telephone:** 0300 222 0000  
**Textphone:** 0300 222 0222  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm  
Weekends and public holidays, 9am to 5:30pm 
$C
overview: Get or renew your passport for free if you are a British national born on or before 2 September 1929
title: Get a free passport
